snippet: The episode occurred east of the city of Palmyra when the Russians had exhausted their ammunition firing in support of Syrian government forces....
abstract: Two Russian airmen die after Islamic State fighters shoot down their Syrian Mi-25 helicopter east of Palmyra, Syria.
lead_paragraph: The episode occurred east of the city of Palmyra when the Russians had exhausted their ammunition firing in support of Syrian government forces.

headline.main: ISIS Shoots Down Helicopter in Syria, Killing 2 Russians
headline.print_headline: Helicopter  Is Shot Down  by ISIS, Killing 2 Russians
